overview: Jenny, her boyfriend Brandon and her stepbrother Ryan return from our prom night. Brandon gets a bit handsy with Jenny, obviously wanting more than she's willing to offer. Ryan and his intense protectiveness for his stepsister, delivers a solid punch that nearly knocks Brandon. It becomes clear that their feelings for each other extend beyond familial.  Ty returns home after several years of absence. He sees his stepsister Bella again and meets his new stepmom Evelyn. However, Ty knows a secret about Evelyn that could destroy the family. He will take the opportunity to blackmail her and get what he wants.
title: Always Been Close
